titleStmt.title: An exposition with practical observations continued upon the fourth, fifth, sixth, and seventh chapters of the prophesy of Hosea· Being first delivered in several lectures at Michaels Cornhil London. By Jeremiah Burroughs. Being the fifth book, published by Thomas Goodwyn, William Greenhil, Sydrach Simson William Bridge, John Yates, William Adderly.
titleStmt.author: Burroughs, Jeremiah, 1599-1646.
Goodwin, Thomas, 1600-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Peter Cole, at the sign of the Printing-Press in Cornhil, near the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copy: "Jan 4th. 1649"; the 50 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Printing-Press in Cornhil, near the Royal Exchange
